body.name: Aveeno Positively Radiant Daily Facial Moisturizer with Total Soy Complex and Broad Spectrum SPF 30 Sunscreen, Oil-Free and Non-Comedogenic, 2.5 fl. oz
body.stockDetail: Only 3 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 1 hr 37 mins
features: 2.5-fluid ounce bottle of Aveeno Positively Radiant Daily Facial Moisturizer with Broad Spectrum SPF 30 Sunscreen is clinically proven to even skin tone and texture in 4 weeks
Formulated with exclusive Total Soy Complex, which works to even skin tone and texture, fight early signs of skin aging, and reduce the look of dark spots to leave skin glowing
Face moisturizer lotion includes broad spectrum SPF 30 sunscreen to help protect your skin from UVA and UVB rays that may cause further sun damage
Formula is oil-free, hypoallergenic, and non-comedogenic, so it won't clog pores as it hydrates skin. The tone-evening moisturizer is also non-greasy and wearable under makeup

The Positively Radiant collection of skincare products is designed to enhance your natural radiance and give you a lit-from-within glow. Each Total Soy Complex enriched product targets even tone and texture
body.description: Even skin tone and texture and reveal naturally radiant skin with Aveeno Positively Radiant Daily Moisturizer with Broad Spectrum SPF 30 sunscreen. This facial moisturizer with sunscreen is clinically proven to improve skin tone and texture in just 4 weeks. This lotion formula, which contains exclusive Total Soy Complex, works to even tone and texture while fighting early signs of skin aging and reducing the look of dark spots. Aveeno Positively Radiant Daily Moisturizer is oil-free, hypoallergenic, and non-comedogenic, and it includes broad spectrum SPF 30 to help protect your skin from further sun damage. This daily facial moisturizer is wearable under makeup and leaves skin glowing. The Positively Radiant collection is designed to enhance your natural radiance and give you a lit-from-within glow. Each Total Soy Complex enriched product targets even tone and texture. Try other Positively Radiant products or explore other Aveeno collections for a skin solution that's positively you.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Aveeno Positively Radiant Makeup Removing Face Wipes for makeup, dirt and oil that can dull skin Gently exfoliates, cleanses, & clarifies to reveal brighter looking, more radiant skin. Brightening face cleanser helps improve the look of skin tone and texture.

With tone correcting soy and hyaluronic acid, delivers a burst of concentrated hydration. Intensive oil-free cream works overnight to brighten dull, uneven skin. Moisturizes to help even skin tone and defend against sun damage.

Calm + Restore Ultra-Calming Dark spots and dullness Clear Complexion Absolutely Ageless Skin Concern Sensitive, irritated, dry skin Sensitive skin and facial redness Dark spots and dullness Blemishes or acne-prone skin Signs of aging Main Benefit The Calm + Restore collection is designed to soothe sensitive skin and strengthen your moisture barrier over time The Ultra-Calming collection is designed to calm sensitive skin and gently reduce the look of redness The Positively Radiant collection is designed to enhance your natural radiance and give you a lit-from-within glow The Clear Complexion collection is designed to care for breakout-prone skin and visibly even skin tone and texture The Absolutely Ageless collection is designed to keep your skin looking youthful Available in Moisturizer, Cleanser, Serum Moisturizer, Foam Cleanser, Makeup Removing Wipes, Nourishing Night Cream Moisturizer, Face Scrub, Cleanser, Makeup Removing Wipes, Intensive Night Cream, In-Shower Facial, Serum + Face Primer, Micellar Gel Cleanser Moisturizer, Salicylic Acid Cleanser, Exfoliating Pads Moisturizer, Restorative Night Cream, Eye Cream, Cleanser Key Ingredients Prebiotic oat, feverfew Purified feverfew extract Soy Complex Soy Complex Antioxidant-rich Blackberry Complex

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sadly received wrong item. This was best skin product I’ve ever used, if only I could get it again.
reviews.reviewText: The actual product is amazing! I have sensitive skin and over the years tried many products. This is the best on all counts. Excellent moisture, no ugly fragrance, amazing texture. Highly recommend!!!Unfortunately not what I received from this shipper, so I’m still trying to find it again.No confidence in shipper but Amazon did refund my money. 😊

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Like to use with/without makeup
reviews.reviewText: I use this product regularly. If I'm planning to use foundation makeup, I put a dab of this on each cheek, add a dab of makeup, and then blend it together over my face. Works well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ... used this product now for several years and absolutely love it. A few years back I made a ...
reviews.reviewText: I have used this product now for several years and absolutely love it. A few years back I made a trip to the dermatologist who informed me that really all people (but especially those with olive skin like me) should be wearing SPF 30 sunscreen every day, a hat, and sunglasses every time they go out in the sun. Well I couldn't commit to wearing a hat and sunglasses for the rest of my life as I am not a private detective and don't own that many cute hats anyway, but I could commit to upping my sunscreen. I had previously used a few products with 15 SPF or similar ranges, but he insisted that 30 SPF was where it's at. He said that over 30 SPF and you aren't really blocking anything extra, just throwing more on to make yourself feel better, but under 30 SPF you are still getting some harmful rays coming through. So I set off in search of a "regular" moisturizer that would not feel, smell, or look like sunscreen when it went on. After some research, I narrowed it down to Neutrogena and Aveeno. I tried both as well as a few others. The others felt like sunscreen as in the smelly, strong, burning stuff you thrown on your kids when you are spending all day at the Water Park. No way that was going to work for me every day. Then I tried the Neutrogena. It was okay . . . slightly better than the regular sunscreen but it still had that tangy smell to me and still burned slightly when I put it on. Finally I got to the Aveeno brand and was, frankly, delighted to find that it felt, smelled, and looked just like REGULAR moisturizer but with the added benefit of having a 30 SPF rating. I have now used it for 4 or 5 years. I put it on every morning before I put my make-up on. It smells like nothing, it is lightweight (not greasy), and when I smear it all over my face during a dry-skin episode it STILL doesn't feel greasy. In addition, I can testify to the strength of the SPF because there have been many occasions when I have been out with family and friends and it unexpectedly gets very sunny and/or we are stuck somewhere in the sun for much longer than we expected and while they come home with red noses and cheery cheeks, without even a second thought, I had protective on my skin all day such that I only have the lightest tan. Sunscreen has never been so painless!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good, but not the best
reviews.reviewText: As someone that is allergic to virtually everything regarding skincare & makeup, this miraculously doesn't break me out with extended application. That in itself is impressive. However, when applied under my eyes or when I start to sweat it does unfortunately still leave them stinging and teary.Overall this product is okay, but it could be better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars best Facial Moisturizer I've used
reviews.reviewText: I think the price of this stuff is getting a little high considering it's such a small bottle, but this stuff is the best facial moisturizer I've used, and is currently the only one I'll use. The difference of my skin post-shower when I use it vs when I don't is huge. I try to use this every evening after my shower, and again every morning after I wash my face and before I put make-up on. I've also had my fiance use it to help with dry patches, and I can visibly see a difference when he uses it for a few days in a row. He has sensitive skin and very dry skin, and it doesn't irritate his skin. It doesn't make the skin feel oily or anything. It just feels like it gives my skin life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Part of my make up routine

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this stuff.
reviews.reviewText: I love that there is the Sunscreen in it. I originally started using it for my new tattoo. It was a great moisturizer for it and helped it heal perfectly. I then started using it on my face. It's making my face feel so refreshed and soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Great Skin Care Routine From My Dermatologist!
reviews.reviewText: This is THE one my dermatologist recommended! Aveeno POSITIVELY RADIANT ONLY! So, that's what I got!! He said wash with Neutrogena Ultra Gentle Cleanser, use this Clinical Strength Vitamin C Serum 20% second, then the Aveeno Postively Radiant, then if going outside for more than 30 min., a SPF 30 sunscreen. He said he likes Neutrogena products because they work well and are reasonably priced. I have been using this regime for about 2 weeks now since ordering all from amazon.com as he recommended because of price (I would have anyway, they are my preferred place to shop). I have seen the blackheads almost all disappear, no kidding! I am amazed! I am very happy, nothing in all my years of trying many products in all price ranges have done this! This is my new 3some! I am passing this along to everybody! I am 63, I've always had oily skin, not as much since I've gotten older, but still around my nose. I don't think this is something he just tells some, he has preprinted papers I think he gives to those who ask. He had the paper carton the Coui vitamin C serum come in to show you what to get along with the printed paper, one for the Aveeno also. It has to be POSITIVELY RADIANT though he said! I am thinking I am finally on the right track. He said the wrinkles and the dark age spots would take a little longer, but to be patient and I can do that! So, I am passing this on to all those who care to try it out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My go to moisturizer has done well for me for a year and still going. The price was really affordable.
love this creme. started using it when living in the States 8 years ago. am just happy I found a way to buy it from Germany now.
Good product and good service as well.
Bote pequeño pero cunde, ademas un olor muy agradable y la textura al hecharla en la cara queda bien, no ngrasa la piel
